item.title: Start a blog!
item.description: Blog! Blarg! Blorg!? Why? Sometimes I have decent’ish ideas to solve challenges faced on the Microsoft Azure cloud, using Azure DevOps or with PowerShell. If there’s code involved with solving these problems, that code tends to disappear in a folder I’ve accordingly named Trash. I frequently hear from colleagues and read tweets of people struggling with the same challenges. This blog will mostly feature my noobish take on challenges with these topics.
